On Jul 1, 2009, at 9:24 AM, Mike Kelly wrote:

> Subbu Allamaraju wrote:
>
>> Servers create links, sometimes using information provided by  
>> clients.
>>
>
> Why does this mean clients cannot create links?

They (browsers) do not. But that is besides the point for this thread.

The key question being debated is whether link management is a client  
concern or it is a consequence of some protocol operation performed by  
a client.

Subbu
